divs: Sighting Detailsall ready did with pa mufon this is a good friend of mine very possible contact with experimation marks on skin going to get medically examined to try to undersatnd what the marks are on the experiencer possible sleep para involved while examing marks ufo is spotted out the window hovering above tree the next night. ran outside and watch for 4 minutes. slowly hovering down behind a tree and they think landing in another yard. experiencer said he thinks he just joined the club. i have photos of marks on body of experiencer
Summary: glowing red triangle white light on each point
